cz.zcu.kiv.bp.unimocker

Class Mocker

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.zcu.kiv.bp.unimocker.Mocker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMocker, org.springframework.osgi.context.BundleContextAware

    public class Mocker
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMocker, org.springframework.osgi.context.BundleContextAware
    IMocker implementation. Implements local mockup builder. When mockup is created, it's also registered as OSGi service.
    Author:
    Michal

      • mock

        public void mock()
        Iterates over the loaded scenario and creates described mockups. Mockups are filled with described invocation possibilities and their return values.
        Specified by:
        mock in interface IMocker
